rules_text: [i]Landfall[/i] – Whenever a land you control enters, create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.
rules_text2:
Lifelink
At the beginning of your end step, search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand, then shuffle. If you gained life this turn, you may put that card onto the battlefield instead.
_
